subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amid a litany of injuries and inconsistency and a soap-opera soundtrack, Nets management has quietly made inquiries to shake up the team’s perimeter core by the Feb. 22 trade deadline.
snippet: Amid a litany of injuries and inconsistency and a soap-opera soundtrack, Nets management has quietly made inquiries to shake up the team’s perimeter core by the Feb. 22 trade deadline.
